title: Who Bombed The Pipeline? (Ep 1861)
description:
In this episode, I address the shocking international events unfolding that could lead to a global world war, and a financial meltdown. I also address the ridiculous attacks on Governor Ron DeSantis ahead of the hurricane’s landfall. 

News Picks:

BREAKING: Elon Musk expresses interest in doing business with Rumble.

Who hit the Nordstream pipeline?


The digital dollar will not be anonymous, Federal Reserve chair Jerome Powell says.

Fakebook censors the wife of FBI whistleblower.


Republicans sound alarm over Chinese government-linked farmland purchase near North Dakota air base.


Is China preparing for war with the United States? 


Manchin's Permitting Deal Imploding Because of 'Poison Pill' That Feeds Left's Green Dreams.


Here’s a link to that mRNA vaccine study and the link to breast-milk.

In this episode, I address the shocking international events unfolding that could lead to a global world war, and a financial meltdown. I also address the ridiculous attacks on Governor Ron DeSantis ahead of the hurricane’s landfall.

  • Is China preparing for war with the United States?
